_loc_LinksActivatedMess: One-click translation is activated: click on any word to translate it
_loc_OriginalPageMess: Original page: one-click translation is not activated
_loc_ServiceUnavailableMessage: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try later
_loc_activateForSub: Would you like to activate translation in subtitles?
_loc_activateForSubDesc: When this function is activated, you can hover over a word to see its translation and click to see more translations and examples in context
_loc_activateReversoInPdfdescription: When this function is activated, you can use Reverso Context to translate in PDF documents
_loc_activateReversoTooltip: All words become clickable and linked to their contextual translation in Reverso Context
_loc_alarmPDF: Click here to activate. You will be able to translate in PDF in a separate tab
_loc_allowAccessToFile: Access to local PDF files is now disabled. If you want to translate PDF files located on your computer, switch on "Allow access to file URLs" in settings: Customize and control Google Chrome -> More tools -> Extensions -> Reverso Translate in Context -> Details
_loc_closeRVTooltip: Disable the icon on all pages
_loc_cookiesError: Cookies are blocked in your browser. Please allow cookies to translate in-page
_loc_loginForSub: Register for free to translate in subtitles in Netflix, Amazon Video, and others

_loc_noTanslatedWords: Translation of more than 50 words is not allowed
_loc_noTanslatedWords8: Translate expressions containing more than 8 words on Reverso.net
_loc_notSupportedDirection: Sorry, this translation direction is not supported
_loc_separateTabPDF: When Reverso is activated, the document opens in a separate tab ...
_loc_serverError: Connection error. Please try again in a few minutes.
_loc_toActivateInSeparateTab: To activate Reverso in the PDF document we opened it in a separate tab
accessToASpecificSite: The selected extension access permissions do not allow Reverso Context to register. The cookies from Reverso site must be accessible. Please either allow the extension on all sites or go to https://account.reverso.net and register there. Then allow the extension to change this site data and activate Reverso Context by its toolbar button.
allowAccessToFile: Access to local PDF files is now disabled. If you want to translate PDF files located on your computer, switch on "Allow access to file URLs" in settings: Customize and control Google Chrome -> More tools -> Extensions -> Reverso Translate in Context -> Details
becomePremiumToTranslateLongerTexts: Become premium to translate longer texts
changeTitlePage:
A page with the same name already exists.
The name was automatically modified and you can edit it later.
descSavePagePromotion: Save web pages and review them later in a clear reading mode, with integrated translation features
displayControlsInterfaceLanguage: Activate in pages in your native language
displayFullTextTranslationPopup: Display full text translation in popup
doubleClickTooltip: Translate via double-click, click here to change mode
downloadAppsFromAppStoreAndGooglePlay: Reverso Context available for free for iOS and Android!
errorDB: Your local data is corrupted due to the last Firefox update. To continue using Reverso Context you need to refresh Firefox. Click "Refresh Firefox…" button in the next page to clean up the corrupted data. You need to reinstall "Reverso Translate in Context" afterwards
errorGetSelection: Cannot get selected text. Please try to select text again or activate Reverso 'one-click' mode

historySave: Save your search history and favorites, synchronize your data for all Reverso services
hitSearch: Type a word or an expression in the search box and hit «Search»
incognitoMode: You are in incognito mode (private browsing). Your authentication data will not be saved for the next session.
incognitoModeForFirefox: You are in private browsing mode. You can't login to your account in this mode.
incorrectPageSaving:
The page could not be saved.

internalVersion: Translate words and expressions in the context of a page in one click or access other Reverso features

noneTooltip: Select and right-click or click on the icon on top bar to translate. Click here to change mode

ratingDescription:

textForGoogleAnalytics:
By enabling this opt-in you allow Google Analytics to collect anonymous statistics of add-on usage. It allows us to improve the add-on.
